member.name: CRYPT_PASSWORD_CREDENTIALSA
member.summary: The CRYPT_PASSWORD_CREDENTIALS structure contains the user name and password credentials to be used in the structure as optional input to a remote object retrieval function such as or .

member.name: CRYPT_PASSWORD_CREDENTIALSA.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this structure.

member.name: CRYPT_PASSWORD_CREDENTIALSA.pszUsername
member.summary: A pointer to a null-terminated string that contains the user name credential for the remote session authentication.

member.name: CRYPT_PASSWORD_CREDENTIALSA.pszPassword
member.summary: A pointer to a null-terminated string that contains the password credential for the remote session authentication.
